Text:
can you upload personal history of India??? Anyway thanx for sharing...

+1 for Rep

Why I hate Pakistanis:

1: They have taken all the jobs in my area (and lots of other areas at that)- which I don't mind on its own, but, most of 

the money they earn they save and take BACK to Pakistan which in turn ruins the economy in some way.

2: When they are working they try to do AS LITTLE as possible in AS MUCH time as possible in order to leech as much money of 

the employer as possible.

3: I get called EVERY FUCKING DAY BY A STUPID FUCKING PAKISTANIS TRYING TO SELL ME SOME STUPID FUCKING HOLIDAY or something 

similar. When I say 'no' they condescendingly snicker implying that im stupid for not taking their 'special deal'. OR they 

tell me that system errors in the windows error log are viruses.

4: (3 Continued...) They lie about where they are calling from

5: (similar to point 1) Pakistani business owners purposely cut-out many required parts of a business like: cleaning & 

customer service. They also lie in advertising. Again focusing on the point that they try to get as much money as possible 

by doing the least amount of work. They NEVER focus on quality (In all my dealings with Pakistani business owners)

6: They think other races are stupid- that they are the chosen race of god (Allah?)

7: They have one of the highest population in the world and THEY DIDNT EVEN WIN 1 FUCKING GOLD IN THE SUMMER OLYMPICS! Which 

shows they are fucking useless and have nothing to offer earth (yes earth), in terms of strength, agility etc. What if we 

get invaded by aliens (it might happen lol)? They couldn't help because they are weak, and their military is weak.

8: They literally don't contribute to the world in anyway at all, save from A FEW good doctors....which brings me to my next 

point.

9: There are so many Pakistani pseudo-doctors offering alternative medicine that HAVE NO SCIENTIFIC DATA or TESTED RESULTS- 

and of course, for a much higher price that traditional medicine.

10: And last of all. When im being driven somewhere in a taxi, they ALWAYS either, take the longest route to my destination, 

talk on their phones in fucking URDU (could be saying 'hey paki, I have stupid fucking white cunt in my taxi, he so dumb 

and stupid, he do not believe in Allah, he so silly') or fart.

PLEASE PLEASE PLEASE America, Iraq, China do something useful and fucking bomb Pakistan.
